technique_name: Kòu Tuì Píng Héng (Rear Cross-legged Balance)
deduction_content: Thigh of supporting leg is not at horizontal level

questions.question: What is the error code for Kòu Tuì Píng Héng (Rear Cross-legged Balance)?
What is the main deduction point for Kòu Tuì Píng Héng?
questions.answer: A deduction is applied when the thigh of supporting leg is not at horizontal level.

questions.question: What is the correct thigh position for the supporting leg in Kòu Tuì Píng Héng?
questions.answer: The thigh of the supporting leg must be at horizontal level.
